doc:
Eric Stuart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Stuart 0 Eric S. Stuart (born October 18, 1967) is an American voice actor, voice director and musician who worked for 4Kids Entertainment, NYAV Post, and Central Park Media. He provides voices for English dubs of anime, cartoons, and video games. Some of his most prominent roles include Brock and James in Pokémon, Seto Kaiba in Yu-Gi-Oh!, and Gourry Gabriev in Slayers. His rock band, the Eric Stuart Band, has toured with many acts in the 1990s including Ringo Starr His All-Starr Band and Peter Frampton. Eric_S._Stuart ( born October_18_,_1967 ) is an_American_voice_actor , voice_director and musician who worked for 4Kids_Entertainment , NYAV_Post , and Central_Park_Media . He provides voices for English dubs of anime , cartoons , and video_games . Some of his_most_prominent_roles include Brock_and_James in Pokémon , Seto_Kaiba in Yu-Gi-Oh ! , and Gourry_Gabriev in Slayers . His_rock_band , the_Eric_Stuart_Band , has_toured with many_acts in the_1990s_including_Ringo_Starr_ and Peter_Frampton .
